Social And Cultural Activities: Social service, particularly for weaker section in terms of social, educational and cultural development; implementing ideology of Babasaheb; organised diagnostic camps, blood donation camps and healthcare services;organised many international, national and state level surgeons conference, live operative workshop and EIYES; conducted special coaching for SC, ST and other backwardclass students belonging to the deprived sections
Special Interests: Teaching, Medical education and research, social service specially downtrodden
Educational Qualifications: M.B.B.S., M.S. and F.I.C.S. Educated at (i) Smt. N.H.L. Municipal Medial College and K.M. School of Post Graduate Medicine and Research, Sheth V.S. General Hospital , Ahmedabad; (ii) B.J. Medical College and Civil Hospital, Ahmedabad; and (iii) Fellow of International College of Surgeon
Other Information: Started private surgical practice; 1982; President (elect) Gujarat State Surgeons Association
